query.value: select sum(inv_value) "Current Outstanding" from inv_summary where over_due_status ='N'
select Age_Bucket, sum(inv_value) inv_value from inv_summary where inv_status ='Open' group by Age_Bucket order by 2 desc
select (sum(case when over_due_status ='Y' then inv_value else 0 end) *100)/sum(inv_value) inv_value from inv_summary where inv_status ='Open';

select cust_short_name , sum(inv_value) total_Outstanding, sum(case when over_due_status ='N' then inv_value else 0 end) Current_Outstanding, sum(case when over_due_status ='Y' then inv_value else 0 end) Overdue, sum(case when Age_Bucket ='1-30' then inv_value else 0 end) "1-30", sum(case when Age_Bucket ='31-60' then inv_value else 0 end) "31-60", sum(case when Age_Bucket ='61-90' then inv_value else 0 end) "61-90", sum(case when Age_Bucket ='91-120' then inv_value else 0 end) "91-120", sum(case when Age_Bucket ='121-150' then inv_value else 0 end) "121-150", sum(case when Age_Bucket ='>150' then inv_value else 0 end) ">150" from inv_summary where inv_status ='Open' group by cust_short_name
